018package com.scivicslab.actoriac.cli;
019
020import java.io.BufferedReader;
021import java.io.File;
022import java.io.IOException;
023import java.io.InputStreamReader;
024import java.io.OutputStream;
025import java.net.InetSocketAddress;
026import java.net.Socket;
027import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
028import java.sql.Connection;
029import java.sql.DriverManager;
030import java.sql.ResultSet;
031import java.sql.SQLException;
032import java.sql.Statement;
033import java.time.OffsetDateTime;
034import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;
035import java.util.ArrayList;
036import java.util.List;
037import java.util.concurrent.Callable;
038import java.util.concurrent.CountDownLatch;
039import java.util.logging.Logger;
040
041import com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpExchange;
042import com.sun.net.httpserver.HttpServer;
043
044import org.h2.tools.Server;
045
046import com.scivicslab.actoriac.log.H2LogStore;
047
048import picocli.CommandLine.Command;
049import picocli.CommandLine.Option;
050
051/**
052 * CLI subcommand to start an H2 TCP server for centralized workflow logging.
053 *
054 * <p>This enables multiple actor-IaC processes on the same machine to write to
055 * a single shared log database. The server runs on localhost only - remote
056 * connections are not needed because actor-IaC operates from a single
057 * operation terminal.</p>
058 *
059 * <p><strong>Architecture:</strong></p>
060 * <pre>
061 * [Operation Terminal]
062 * ├── H2 Log Server (localhost:29090)
063 * ├── Workflow Process A ──→ TCP write
064 * ├── Workflow Process B ──→ TCP write
065 * └── Workflow Process C ──→ TCP write
066 *          │
067 *          │ SSH commands
068 *          ▼
069 * [Remote Nodes] ← Don't write directly to log server
070 * </pre>
071 *
072 * <p><strong>Usage:</strong></p>
073 * <pre>{@code
074 * # Start the log server
075 * actor-iac log-server --db ./logs/actor-iac-logs
076 *
077 * # In another terminal, run workflow with --log-server
078 * actor-iac -d ./workflows -w deploy --log-server=localhost:29090
079 * }</pre>
080 *
081 * @author devteam@scivics-lab.com
082 */
083@Command(
084    name = "log-serve",
085    mixinStandardHelpOptions = true,
086    version = "actor-IaC log-serve 2.12.0",
087    description = "Serve H2 TCP server for centralized workflow logging."
088)
089public class LogServerCLI implements Callable<Integer> {
090
091    private static final Logger LOG = Logger.getLogger(LogServerCLI.class.getName());
092
093    @Option(
094        names = {"-p", "--port"},
095        description = "TCP port for H2 server (default: ${DEFAULT-VALUE})",
096        defaultValue = "29090"
097    )
098    private int port;
099
100    @Option(
101        names = {"--db"},
102        description = "Database file path without extension (default: ${DEFAULT-VALUE})",
103        defaultValue = "./actor-iac-logs"
104    )
105    private File dbPath;
106
107    @Option(
108        names = {"-v", "--verbose"},
109        description = "Enable verbose output"
110    )
111    private boolean verbose;
112
113    @Option(
114        names = {"--find"},
115        description = "Find running H2 log servers on localhost and show port status"
116    )
117    private boolean find;
118
119    @Option(
120        names = {"--info-port"},
121        description = "HTTP port for info API (default: TCP port - 200)"
122    )
123    private Integer infoPort;
124
125    @Option(
126        names = {"--auto-shutdown"},
127        description = "Enable automatic shutdown when no connections for --idle-timeout seconds"
128    )
129    private boolean autoShutdown;
130
131    @Option(
132        names = {"--idle-timeout"},
133        description = "Idle timeout in seconds for auto-shutdown (default: ${DEFAULT-VALUE})",
134        defaultValue = "300"
135    )
136    private long idleTimeoutSeconds;
137
138    @Option(
139        names = {"--check-interval"},
140        description = "Connection check interval in seconds (default: ${DEFAULT-VALUE})",
141        defaultValue = "60"
142    )
143    private long checkIntervalSeconds;
144
145    private Server tcpServer;
146    private HttpServer httpServer;
147    private OffsetDateTime startedAt;
148
149    /** ActorSystem for actor-based shutdown management */
150    private com.scivicslab.pojoactor.core.ActorSystem actorSystem;
151
152    /** The log server actor (used when --auto-shutdown is enabled) */
153    private com.scivicslab.pojoactor.core.ActorRef<LogServerActor> logServerActorRef;
154
155    /** The connection watcher actor */
156    private ConnectionWatcherActor connectionWatcher;
157
158    /** Scheduler for periodic connection checks */
159    private java.util.concurrent.ScheduledExecutorService scheduler;
160
161    /** Default offset from TCP port to HTTP port (TCP - 200 = HTTP) */
162    private static final int HTTP_PORT_OFFSET = -200;
163
164    /** Ports to scan for H2 servers (actor-IaC reserved range: 29090-29100) */
165    private static final int[] SCAN_PORTS = {29090, 29091, 29092, 29093, 29094, 29095, 29096, 29097, 29098, 29099, 29100};
166    private final CountDownLatch shutdownLatch = new CountDownLatch(1);
167
168    @Override
169    public Integer call() {
170        // Handle --find option
171        if (find) {
172            return findLogServers();
173        }
174
175        // Calculate HTTP port
176        int httpPort = (infoPort != null) ? infoPort : port + HTTP_PORT_OFFSET;
177
178        // Choose between actor mode (with auto-shutdown) and legacy mode
179        if (autoShutdown) {
180            return runWithActorMode(httpPort);
181        } else {
182            return runLegacyMode(httpPort);
183        }
184    }
185
186    /**
187     * Runs the log server with actor-based auto-shutdown.
188     *
189     * <p>Architecture:</p>
190     * <pre>
191     * ActorSystem
192     *   ├── LogServerActor (wraps H2 TCP + HTTP servers)
193     *   └── ConnectionWatcherActor (monitors and triggers shutdown)
194     * </pre>
195     */
196    private Integer runWithActorMode(int httpPort) {
197        try {
198            // Create ActorSystem
199            actorSystem = new com.scivicslab.pojoactor.core.ActorSystem("log-server", 2);
200
201            // Create LogServerActor POJO
202            LogServerActor logServerPojo = new LogServerActor(port, httpPort, dbPath, verbose);
203
204            // Wrap with ActorRef
205            logServerActorRef = actorSystem.actorOf("log-server", logServerPojo);
206
207            // Start the server via actor
208            logServerActorRef.ask(server -> {
209                try {
210                    server.start(shutdownLatch);
211                } catch (Exception e) {
212                    throw new RuntimeException("Failed to start server", e);
213                }
214                return null;
215            }).join();
216
217            // Print connection info
218            printConnectionInfo(httpPort);
219            System.out.println("  Auto-shutdown: enabled (idle timeout: " + idleTimeoutSeconds + "s)");
220
221            // Create and start ConnectionWatcher
222            connectionWatcher = new ConnectionWatcherActor(
223                logServerActorRef,
224                checkIntervalSeconds,
225                idleTimeoutSeconds,
226                verbose
227            );
228
229            // Create scheduler for watcher
230            scheduler = java.util.concurrent.Executors.newScheduledThreadPool(1, r -> {
231                Thread t = new Thread(r, "ConnectionWatcher");
232                t.setDaemon(true);
233                return t;
234            });
235
236            connectionWatcher.start(scheduler);
237
238            // Register shutdown hook
239            Runtime.getRuntime().addShutdownHook(new Thread(this::shutdownActorMode, "LogServer-Shutdown"));
240
241            System.out.println("\nServer is running with auto-shutdown enabled.");
242            System.out.println("Will shutdown after " + idleTimeoutSeconds + " seconds of no connections.");
243
244            // Wait for shutdown signal (from either Ctrl+C or auto-shutdown)
245            shutdownLatch.await();
246
247            return 0;
248
249        } catch (Exception e) {
250            System.err.println("Failed to start log server: " + e.getMessage());
251            if (verbose) {
252                e.printStackTrace();
253            }
254            return 1;
255        }
256    }
257
258    /**
259     * Runs the log server in legacy mode (no auto-shutdown).
260     */
261    private Integer runLegacyMode(int httpPort) {
262        try {
263            // Record start time
264            startedAt = OffsetDateTime.now();
265
266            // Build server arguments (localhost only - no remote connections needed)
267            String[] serverArgs = new String[]{
268                "-tcp",
269                "-tcpPort", String.valueOf(port),
270                "-ifNotExists"
271            };
272
273            // Create and start TCP server
274            tcpServer = Server.createTcpServer(serverArgs);
275            tcpServer.start();
276
277            // Initialize database schema
278            initializeDatabase();
279
280            // Start HTTP info server
281            startHttpServer(httpPort);
282
283            // Print connection info
284            printConnectionInfo(httpPort);
285
286            // Register shutdown hook
287            Runtime.getRuntime().addShutdownHook(new Thread(this::shutdown, "LogServer-Shutdown"));
288
289            System.out.println("\nServer is running. Press Ctrl+C to stop.");
290
291            // Wait for shutdown signal
292            shutdownLatch.await();
293
294            return 0;
295
296        } catch (SQLException e) {
297            System.err.println("Failed to initialize database: " + e.getMessage());
298            if (verbose) {
299                e.printStackTrace();
300            }
301            return 1;
302        } catch (Exception e) {
303            System.err.println("Failed to start log server: " + e.getMessage());
304            if (verbose) {
305                e.printStackTrace();
306            }
307            return 1;
308        }
309    }
310
311    private void initializeDatabase() throws SQLException {
312        String dbUrl = "jdbc:h2:tcp://localhost:" + port + "/" + dbPath.getAbsolutePath();
313
314        try (Connection conn = DriverManager.getConnection(dbUrl)) {
315            H2LogStore.initSchema(conn);
316
317            if (verbose) {
318                System.out.println("Database schema initialized: " + dbPath.getAbsolutePath());
319            }
320        }
321    }
322
323    /**
324     * Starts the HTTP server for the /info API endpoint.
325     */
326    private void startHttpServer(int httpPort) throws IOException {
327        httpServer = HttpServer.create(new InetSocketAddress("localhost", httpPort), 0);
328        httpServer.createContext("/info", this::handleInfoRequest);
329        httpServer.setExecutor(null); // Use default executor
330        httpServer.start();
331
332        if (verbose) {
333            System.out.println("HTTP info server started on port " + httpPort);
334        }
335    }
336
337    /**
338     * Handles GET /info requests, returning server information as JSON.
339     */
340    private void handleInfoRequest(HttpExchange exchange) throws IOException {
341        if (!"GET".equals(exchange.getRequestMethod())) {
342            exchange.sendResponseHeaders(405, -1);
343            return;
344        }
345
346        try {
347            // Get session count from database
348            int sessionCount = getSessionCount();
349
350            // Build JSON response
351            String json = String.format("""
352                {
353                  "server": "actor-iac-log-server",
354                  "version": "2.11.0",
355                  "port": %d,
356                  "db_path": "%s",
357                  "db_file": "%s.mv.db",
358                  "started_at": "%s",
359                  "session_count": %d
360                }
361                """,
362                port,
363                escapeJson(dbPath.getAbsolutePath()),
364                escapeJson(dbPath.getAbsolutePath()),
365                startedAt.format(DateTimeFormatter.ISO_OFFSET_DATE_TIME),
366                sessionCount
367            );
368
369            byte[] response = json.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
370            exchange.getResponseHeaders().add("Content-Type", "application/json");
371            exchange.sendResponseHeaders(200, response.length);
372            try (OutputStream os = exchange.getResponseBody()) {
373                os.write(response);
374            }
375        } catch (Exception e) {
376            String error = "{\"error\": \"" + escapeJson(e.getMessage()) + "\"}";
377            byte[] response = error.getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
378            exchange.getResponseHeaders().add("Content-Type", "application/json");
379            exchange.sendResponseHeaders(500, response.length);
380            try (OutputStream os = exchange.getResponseBody()) {
381                os.write(response);
382            }
383        }
384    }
385
386    /**
387     * Gets the current session count from the database.
388     */
389    private int getSessionCount() {
390        String dbUrl = "jdbc:h2:tcp://localhost:" + port + "/" + dbPath.getAbsolutePath();
391        try (Connection conn = DriverManager.getConnection(dbUrl);
392             Statement stmt = conn.createStatement();
393             ResultSet rs = stmt.executeQuery("SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sessions")) {
394            if (rs.next()) {
395                return rs.getInt(1);
396            }
397        } catch (SQLException e) {
398            if (verbose) {
399                System.err.println("Failed to get session count: " + e.getMessage());
400            }
401        }
402        return 0;
403    }
404
405    /**
406     * Escapes special characters for JSON strings.
407     */
408    private String escapeJson(String value) {
409        if (value == null) return "";
410        return value
411            .replace("\\", "\\\\")
412            .replace("\"", "\\\"")
413            .replace("\n", "\\n")
414            .replace("\r", "\\r")
415            .replace("\t", "\\t");
416    }
417
418    private void printConnectionInfo(int httpPort) {
419        System.out.println();
420        System.out.println("=".repeat(60));
421        System.out.println("H2 Log Server Started");
422        System.out.println("=".repeat(60));
423        System.out.println("  TCP Port:   " + port);
424        System.out.println("  HTTP Port:  " + httpPort);
425        System.out.println("  Database:   " + dbPath.getAbsolutePath() + ".mv.db");
426        System.out.println();
427        System.out.println("Connect from workflows using:");
428        System.out.println("  --log-serve=localhost:" + port);
429        System.out.println();
430        System.out.println("Server info API:");
431        System.out.println("  curl http://localhost:" + httpPort + "/info");
432        System.out.println();
433        System.out.println("Query logs using:");
434        System.out.println("  actor-iac log-search --server=localhost:" + port + " --db " + dbPath.getAbsolutePath() + " --list");
435        System.out.println("=".repeat(60));
436    }
437
438    private void shutdown() {
439        System.out.println("\nShutting down servers...");
440        if (httpServer != null) {
441            httpServer.stop(0);
442        }
443        if (tcpServer != null) {
444            tcpServer.stop();
445        }
446        shutdownLatch.countDown();
447        System.out.println("Servers stopped.");
448    }
449
450    /**
451     * Shuts down the server when running in actor mode.
452     */
453    private void shutdownActorMode() {
454        System.out.println("\nShutting down (actor mode)...");
455
456        // Stop the watcher first
457        if (connectionWatcher != null) {
458            connectionWatcher.stop();
459        }
460
461        // Stop the scheduler
462        if (scheduler != null) {
463            scheduler.shutdownNow();
464        }
465
466        // Stop the log server via actor
467        if (logServerActorRef != null) {
468            try {
469                logServerActorRef.ask(server -> {
470                    server.stop();
471                    return null;
472                }).join();
473            } catch (Exception e) {
474                // Server might already be stopped
475            }
476        }
477
478        // Terminate actor system
479        if (actorSystem != null) {
480            actorSystem.terminate();
481        }
482
483        System.out.println("Servers stopped (actor mode).");
484    }
485
486    /**
487     * Finds running H2 log servers on localhost.
488     *
489     * @return exit code (0 = success)
490     */
491    private Integer findLogServers() {
492        System.out.println("=".repeat(60));
493        System.out.println("Scanning for H2 Log Servers on localhost...");
494        System.out.println("=".repeat(60));
495        System.out.println();
496
497        List<ServerInfo> h2Servers = new ArrayList<>();
498        List<ServerInfo> otherServices = new ArrayList<>();
499
500        for (int scanPort : SCAN_PORTS) {
501            ServerInfo info = checkPort(scanPort);
502            if (info != null) {
503                if (info.isH2Server) {
504                    h2Servers.add(info);
505                } else {
506                    otherServices.add(info);
507                }
508            }
509        }
510
511        // Report H2 log servers found
512        if (h2Servers.isEmpty()) {
513            System.out.println("No H2 log servers found.");
514            System.out.println();
515            System.out.println("To start a log server:");
516            System.out.println("  ./actor_iac.java log-serve --db ./logs/actor-iac-logs");
517        } else {
518            System.out.println("H2 Log Servers Found:");
519            System.out.println("-".repeat(60));
520            for (ServerInfo info : h2Servers) {
521                System.out.println("  Port " + info.port + ": H2 Database Server");
522                if (info.hasHttpApi) {
523                    System.out.println("           HTTP API: http://localhost:" + info.httpPort + "/info");
524                    if (info.version != null) {
525                        System.out.println("           Version:  " + info.version);
526                    }
527                }
528                if (info.dbPath != null) {
529                    System.out.println("           Database: " + info.dbPath);
530                }
531                if (info.sessionCount >= 0) {
532                    System.out.println("           Sessions: " + info.sessionCount);
533                }
534                if (info.startedAt != null) {
535                    System.out.println("           Started:  " + info.startedAt);
536                }
537                System.out.println("           Connect:  --log-serve=localhost:" + info.port);
538                System.out.println();
539            }
540        }
541
542        // Report other services on nearby ports
543        if (!otherServices.isEmpty()) {
544            System.out.println();
545            System.out.println("Other Services on Nearby Ports:");
546            System.out.println("-".repeat(60));
547            for (ServerInfo info : otherServices) {
548                System.out.println("  Port " + info.port + ": " + info.serviceName);
549                if (info.processInfo != null) {
550                    System.out.println("           Process: " + info.processInfo);
551                }
552            }
553        }
554
555        // Suggest available port
556        int availablePort = findAvailablePort();
557        if (availablePort > 0 && h2Servers.isEmpty()) {
558            System.out.println();
559            System.out.println("All ports in range 29090-29100 are available.");
560            System.out.println("Start a log server with:");
561            System.out.println("  ./actor_iac.java log-serve --db ./logs/actor-iac-logs");
562        } else if (availablePort > 0) {
563            System.out.println();
564            System.out.println("Next available port: " + availablePort);
565            System.out.println("  ./actor_iac.java log-serve --port " + availablePort + " --db ./logs/actor-iac-logs");
566        }
567
568        System.out.println();
569        System.out.println("=".repeat(60));
570
571        return 0;
572    }
573
574    /**
575     * Checks what's running on a port.
576     */
577    private ServerInfo checkPort(int checkPort) {
578        // First, check if port is open
579        try (Socket socket = new Socket("localhost", checkPort)) {
580            socket.setSoTimeout(1000);
581            // Port is open, try to identify the service
582        } catch (Exception e) {
583            // Port not open
584            return null;
585        }
586
587        ServerInfo info = new ServerInfo(checkPort);
588
589        // Try to connect as H2
590        try {
591            // Try to connect to H2 and query session count
592            String url = "jdbc:h2:tcp://localhost:" + checkPort + "/~/.h2/test;IFEXISTS=TRUE";
593            try (Connection conn = DriverManager.getConnection(url)) {
594                info.isH2Server = true;
595                // This DB might not have our schema, but we know it's H2
596            }
597        } catch (SQLException e) {
598            // Check if it's "Database not found" - that still means H2 server is running
599            String msg = e.getMessage();
600            if (msg != null && (msg.contains("Database") || msg.contains("not found") ||
601                    msg.contains("Connection is broken") || msg.contains("90067"))) {
602                info.isH2Server = true;
603            }
604        }
605
606        if (info.isH2Server) {
607            // Try to get info from actor-iac-logs database
608            tryGetLogServerInfo(info);
609        } else {
610            // Try to identify other services using lsof
611            info.serviceName = identifyService(checkPort);
612        }
613
614        return info;
615    }
616
617    /**
618     * Tries to get information about a log server's database.
619     * First tries HTTP API, then falls back to database queries.
620     */
621    private void tryGetLogServerInfo(ServerInfo info) {
622        // First, try HTTP API (TCP port - 200)
623        if (tryGetInfoFromHttpApi(info, info.port + HTTP_PORT_OFFSET)) {
624            return;
625        }
626
627        // Fallback: try common database paths via JDBC
628        String[] commonPaths = {
629            "./actor-iac-logs",
630            "./logs/actor-iac-logs",
631            System.getProperty("user.home") + "/actor-iac-logs"
632        };
633
634        for (String path : commonPaths) {
635            try {
636                String url = "jdbc:h2:tcp://localhost:" + info.port + "/" + path;
637                try (Connection conn = DriverManager.getConnection(url);
638                     Statement stmt = conn.createStatement();
639                     ResultSet rs = stmt.executeQuery("SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sessions")) {
640                    if (rs.next()) {
641                        info.sessionCount = rs.getInt(1);
642                        info.dbPath = path;
643                        return;
644                    }
645                }
646            } catch (SQLException e) {
647                // This path doesn't have our schema, try next
648            }
649        }
650    }
651
652    /**
653     * Tries to get server info from HTTP API.
654     *
655     * @return true if successfully got info from API
656     */
657    private boolean tryGetInfoFromHttpApi(ServerInfo info, int httpPort) {
658        try {
659            java.net.URL url = new java.net.URL("http://localhost:" + httpPort + "/info");
660            java.net.HttpURLConnection conn = (java.net.HttpURLConnection) url.openConnection();
661            conn.setConnectTimeout(1000);
662            conn.setReadTimeout(1000);
663            conn.setRequestMethod("GET");
664
665            if (conn.getResponseCode() == 200) {
666                try (BufferedReader reader = new BufferedReader(
667                        new InputStreamReader(conn.getInputStream(), StandardCharsets.UTF_8))) {
668                    StringBuilder json = new StringBuilder();
669                    String line;
670                    while ((line = reader.readLine()) != null) {
671                        json.append(line);
672                    }
673
674                    // Parse JSON manually (avoid dependency)
675                    String jsonStr = json.toString();
676                    info.hasHttpApi = true;
677                    info.httpPort = httpPort;
678                    info.dbPath = extractJsonString(jsonStr, "db_path");
679                    info.version = extractJsonString(jsonStr, "version");
680                    info.startedAt = extractJsonString(jsonStr, "started_at");
681                    info.sessionCount = extractJsonInt(jsonStr, "session_count");
682                    return true;
683                }
684            }
685        } catch (Exception e) {
686            // HTTP API not available
687        }
688        return false;
689    }
690
691    /**
692     * Extracts a string value from JSON.
693     */
694    private String extractJsonString(String json, String key) {
695        String pattern = "\"" + key + "\"\\s*:\\s*\"([^\"]+)\"";
696        java.util.regex.Pattern p = java.util.regex.Pattern.compile(pattern);
697        java.util.regex.Matcher m = p.matcher(json);
698        return m.find() ? m.group(1) : null;
699    }
700
701    /**
702     * Extracts an integer value from JSON.
703     */
704    private int extractJsonInt(String json, String key) {
705        String pattern = "\"" + key + "\"\\s*:\\s*(\\d+)";
706        java.util.regex.Pattern p = java.util.regex.Pattern.compile(pattern);
707        java.util.regex.Matcher m = p.matcher(json);
708        return m.find() ? Integer.parseInt(m.group(1)) : -1;
709    }
710
711    /**
712     * Identifies a service using lsof.
713     */
714    private String identifyService(int checkPort) {
715        try {
716            ProcessBuilder pb = new ProcessBuilder("lsof", "-i", ":" + checkPort, "-sTCP:LISTEN");
717            pb.redirectErrorStream(true);
718            Process process = pb.start();
719
720            try (BufferedReader reader = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(process.getInputStream()))) {
721                String line;
722                while ((line = reader.readLine()) != null) {
723                    if (!line.startsWith("COMMAND")) {
724                        String[] parts = line.split("\\s+");
725                        if (parts.length > 0) {
726                            return parts[0]; // Process name
727                        }
728                    }
729                }
730            }
731            process.waitFor();
732        } catch (Exception e) {
733            // lsof not available or failed
734        }
735
736        return "Unknown service";
737    }
738
739    /**
740     * Finds an available port.
741     */
742    private int findAvailablePort() {
743        for (int scanPort : SCAN_PORTS) {
744            try (Socket socket = new Socket("localhost", scanPort)) {
745                // Port is in use
746            } catch (Exception e) {
747                // Port is available
748                return scanPort;
749            }
750        }
751        return -1;
752    }
753
754    /**
755     * Information about a service running on a port.
756     */
757    private static class ServerInfo {
758        final int port;
759        boolean isH2Server = false;
760        boolean hasHttpApi = false;
761        int httpPort = -1;
762        String dbPath = null;
763        int sessionCount = -1;
764        String startedAt = null;
765        String version = null;
766        String serviceName = null;
767        String processInfo = null;
768
769        ServerInfo(int port) {
770            this.port = port;
771        }
772    }
773}
